message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. I believe this price reflects the value you would place on it, given its worth to you is $100. Let me know if this works for you!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product at a price close to its value to me. I would like to counter with an offer of $85 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your pricing strategy.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet somewhere in the middle. I am unable to accept $85 for the product, but I am willing to consider $90. This still allows us to approach the value you see in the product while maintaining a reasonable profit margin for me. I look forward to your response.

I understand your position, Alice. I've carefully considered your latest offer and would like to counter with $87 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between the value to me and your profit margin.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $88 for the product. I believe this price respects both the value you see in it and maintains a reasonable profit margin for me. I hope this aligns well with your expectations.
